name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Atatus - Make your app faster and bug free

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Real User Monitoring (RUM) and JavaScript Error Tracking for Web and Hybrid Apps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Real User Monitorig (RUM) and JavaScript Error Tracking for Modern Web Applications. Monitoring how fast your site is, and how you can improve the performance of your web app for all your users. Get every JS error that happens to your users, along with the actions that user performed and reproduce them at your end to resolve them faster.

Track every AJAX requests to see which API slows down your app. Find it on a beautiful visual graph that makes bottlenecks immediately obvious.

Understanding key transactions that are critical to your business, by analyzing how much time is spent on these. When it detects common mistakes that make transactions slower, Atatus will mark that transaction with a Heads-Up, letting you know where the low-hanging fruit is.

Just takes a few minutes to integrate into all your HTML files. 

Atatus integrates with Slack, HipChat, Campfire, Flowdock, JIRA, BugHerd, Asana, PivotalTracker.
